title: Google Analytics Data API v1beta - CohortSpec Type
description: The specification of cohorts for a cohort report. Cohort reports create a time series of user retention for the cohort

cohorts.description: The cohorts requested for the report

name.description: Assigns a name to this cohort

dimension.description: The dimension used by cohort. Required and only supports firstSessionDate

dateRange.description: The cohort selects users whose first session date is between start date and end date

cohortsRange.description: Specifies the selection criteria for the cohorts

granularity.description: The granularity used to interpret the startOffset and endOffset

startOffset.description: startOffset is relative to the first cohort date

endOffset.description: endOffset is relative to the first cohort date

accumulate.description: If true, accumulates cohort data over the cohort's lifetime

metadata.description: Defines the specification for cohort reports in Google Analytics
